name: skillgrid-website
description: SkillGrid website with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:production: cd frontend && npm run build:production && cd ../backend && npm run build:production
scripts.build:staging: cd frontend && npm run build:staging && cd ../backend && npm run build:staging
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:production: cd frontend && npm run test:production && cd ../backend && npm run test:production
scripts.preview: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
